Changelog
=========

0.3.0 (2017-10-10)
------------------

- Add ``seq.chain(*sequences)`` and ``gen.chain(*iterables)``
- Some speed optimizations, especially to ``seq``.

0.2.0 (2017-09-11)
------------------

- LengthChangedError is now a subclass of ``RuntimeError``.
- Minor optimizations to ``seq`` and ``gen``.

0.1.0 (2017-06-06)
------------------

- First version
